name: Klique
description: KLIQUE, the global leader in empowering businesses worldwide and committed to providing world-class CRM solutions that help businesses of all sizes grow and succeed. We want to transform the current environment, where developers have a robotic tendency to offer a simple fix without regard for the end-user. Along with our specialised Salesforce solutions, we make a strong effort to restore that empathy and compassion.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Innovative Solutions for a Connected World
ShortDescription: The organization is supported by a group of seasoned industry professionals with years of combined expertise.

Highlights.name: Sales Cloud
Highlights.description: With Sales cloud, you can streamline processes reduce duplication, set priorities, access information, and improve communication on the go. Here you can get a consolidated view of history and status, generate workflows and increase efficiency.

Highlights.name: Service Cloud
Highlights.description: It aids in responding to customer queries more intelligently and quickly. With Service cloud, you can achieve increased customer engagements, organize and prioritize issues

Highlights.name: Field Service Lightning
Highlights.description: t is now known as Salesforce field service, which provides services that extend beyond your workplace. Field service is part of an organization that employs a worker to perform services for a customer.

enhanced_description: Klique is positioned as a global leader in providing world-class CRM solutions, with a specialized focus on Salesforce. They aim to transform the typical developer approach by prioritizing empathy and end-user needs, moving beyond simple, robotic fixes. Their core offerings include website and app development, data analytics, and PDF remediation. Leveraging artificial intelligence, machine learning, and Internet of Things (IoT) technologies, Klique extends its expertise to HR, specifically targeting acceleration of skill development and learning efficiency, and improving training effectiveness. They offer in-depth solutions for key Salesforce clouds, including Sales Cloud for streamlining sales processes and increasing efficiency, Service Cloud for intelligent customer query resolution and enhanced customer engagement, and Field Service Lightning (now Salesforce Field Service) for managing services performed beyond the traditional workplace. The organization is supported by a team of seasoned industry professionals.
key_use_cases: Sales process streamlining and efficiency improvement (via Salesforce Sales Cloud)
Customer service management and enhanced customer engagement (via Salesforce Service Cloud)
Field service management and optimization (via Salesforce Field Service)
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency within organizations
competitive_advantages: Emphasis on empathy and end-user centric development
implementation_scenarios: Custom Salesforce cloud implementation and configuration
Website and mobile application development projects
hr_functions_supported: Learning & Development (Skill Development, Skill Acquisition, Training Effectiveness)
roi_benefits: Increased efficiency and streamlined processes (via Sales Cloud)
Faster and more intelligent customer query responses (via Service Cloud)
